terms-title: These terms and conditions govern your use of the [SECRET STRATEGY] (www.wimehr.com) website and related services. By accessing the site or using the services, you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully.
terms-one-content: By registering and using our services, you agree to comply with these terms. If you disagree with any of these terms, please do not use the site or services.
terms-two-content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time without prior notice. Your continued use of the site after changes are made signifies your acceptance of the new terms. Please review these terms regularly.
terms-three-content: To use some of our services, you must create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for any activity that occurs under your account. You agree to provide accurate information and update it as necessary.
terms-four-content: You agree to use our site and services in a lawful and responsible manner. Any unauthorized use of the site may result in suspension or termination of your access.

terms-six-content: Users must refrain from posting or uploading any illegal, offensive, or infringing content. We reserve the right to remove any inappropriate content.
terms-seven-content: We are committed to supporting the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). All sellers and users of the platform must ensure that the products and services offered on the site comply with SDGs principles and criteria. Non-compliance may result in the removal of the related content and termination of user access to the site.
terms-eight-content: We do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free operation of the site. We are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of the site.
terms-nine-content: We reserve the right to terminate your access to the site and services at any time without prior notice, especially in cases of violation of these terms.
terms-ten-content: These terms are governed by the laws of [your country], and any disputes arising from them will be referred to the courts of [your city or region].
